rooms.description: Wide entry hall with natural light from clerestory windows and ventilation openings.
Open concept living room adjoining the kitchen, designed for ample sunlight and airflow.
Adjacent dining area with access to an outdoor terrace, ensuring natural light and ventilation.
Enclosed home theater designed with acoustic insulation and ambient lighting. It is partially recessed into the ground floor for privacy and energy efficiency.
Compact servant's quarters with basic amenities, located in a quieter corner of the villa adhering to Vastu principles.
One-car garage for vehicle storage integrated within the ground floor layout ensuring easy access and natural light.

openings.description: Large entrance door with a reinforced concrete frame typical of Brutalist design, allowing for controlled natural ventilation.
L-shaped windows ensuring ample daylight and cross-ventilation in accordance with Vastu norms.
High window openings that allow maximum natural light while maintaining privacy.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. Positioned in the north-east to benefit from positive Vastu energy and abundant natural light.
Secondary bedroom designed for guest use or additional storage, incorporating ample ventilation.
Additional full bathroom with modern fixtures ensuring adequate ventilation and adherence to local building norms.

openings.description: Large window placements on the south-west facade for optimal natural light and cross-ventilation in line with Vastu principles.
Balcony overlooking a landscaped garden, designed to enhance natural lighting and provide ventilation.

rooms.description: Deluxe bedroom suite with an ensuite bathroom featuring expansive glass walls for natural light and scenic views, aligning with luxury requirements.
A dedicated study area incorporated into the bedroom suite for privacy and functional design.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows providing unobstructed views and abundant natural light, designed in accordance with local norms and Vastu principles.
Small balcony offering a personal outdoor space to enhance ventilation.
